Objective: Verify that a new user can register successfully using a unique email.
Prerequisites: User is logged out and on the homepage.
Test Data:
First Name: John
Last Name: Doe
Gender: Male/Female           Email:test+<timestamp>@example.com
Password: Test@123
Confirm Password: Test@123
Test Steps:
1. Open homepage.
2. Click “Register”.
3. Fill all required fields (Firstname, Lastname, Gender, Email, Password, Confirm Password).
4. Click on the “Register” button.
Expected Results: User is successfully registered and automatically logged in. "My Account" link appears.
Acceptance Criteria: Registration complete shows on screen.user session is active; "My Account" is visible.

Objective: Verify that the system shows an error when attempting to register with an existing email
Prerequisites: An existing account already registered in the system.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Register page.
2. Fill all required fields (Firstname, Lastname, Gender, Password, Confirm Password).
3. Enter an already registered email address.
4. Click the “Register” button
Expected Results: Registration is rejected. System displays error: "The specified email already exists."
Acceptance Criteria: The error message is visible; user stays on registration page; no new account is created.

Objective: Verify that registration fails when password length is less than the minimum requirement
Test Data:
Unique email
Short password (e.g., "123") — LESS than 6 characters
Test Steps:
1. Enter unique email.
2. Enter password shorter than 6 characters.
3. Enter same short password in Confirm Password.
4. Click Register
Expected Results:
Registration fails; error message appears:
"The password should have at least 6 characters."
Acceptance Criteria: User remains on registration page, account is NOT created

Objective: Verify error message for incorrect password
Test Steps:
1. Open Login page.
2. Enter valid email and password.
3. Click Login
Expected Results: User is authenticated; redirected to account/home.
Acceptance Criteria: My Account" and "Logout" are visible; user session created.

Objective: Verify error for invalid password on login.
Test Steps:
1. Open Login
2. Enter registered email + wrong password
3. Click Login
Expected Results: Error message "Login was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again.The credentials provided are incorrect" is displayed
Acceptance Criteria: No session created; user stays on Login page

Objective: Navigate to 14.1-inch Laptop via Computers > Notebooks.
Test Steps:
1. Open homepage                     2. Hover Computers
3. Click Notebooks
4. Click '14.1-inch Laptop'
Expected Results: Product page for 14.1-inch Laptop should open
Acceptance Criteria: Product name, price, stock status, image, and Add to cart must match expected

Objective: Verify product name & price are consistent across PDP ? Cart ? Checkout.
Test Steps:
1. Note name & price
2. Add to cart
3. Open Cart
4. Proceed to Checkout
Expected Results: Name and price match stay same everywhere.
Acceptance Criteria: No mismatch in displayed values.

Objective: Add item to cart and verify qty=1.
Test Steps:
1. Add to cart
2. Open cart
Expected Results: Cart shows 1 item subtotal = price * 1
Acceptance Criteria: Cart badge count = 1

Objective: Set quantity to 0 and check behavior.
Test Steps:
1. Set qty to 0.                                             
2.click on check box                    3. Click Update.
Expected Results: Your Shopping Cart is empty!
Acceptance Criteria: Cart never shows a negative or zero subtotal.

Objective: Verify maximum quantity limit handling.
Test Steps:
1. Set qty to 100
2. Update cart
Expected Results: System  recalculates total correctly according to entered quantity.
Acceptance Criteria: Correct totals, no overflow or crash.

Objective: Verify subtotal = sum of line items.
Test Steps:
1. Add 2+ items
2. Compare displayed subtotal with manual calculation
Expected Results: Subtotal is accurate
Acceptance Criteria: No calculation error beyond decimal

Objective: Remove item and verify cart updates
Prerequisites: At least one item in cart.
Test Steps:
1. Open cart page.
2. Select the Remove checkbox for the item.
3. Click Update Shopping Cart.
Expected Results: Item is removed, subtotal updates.
Acceptance Criteria: Empty cart message appears if all items removed

Objective: Complete checkout with a new billing address
Prerequisites: User is logged in and has at least one item in the cart.
Test Data:
Country: Valid country (e.g., United States)
State/Province: Valid state (if applicable)
First Name: Valid first name
Last Name: Valid last name
Email: Valid email address
Address Line 1: Valid street address
Address Line 2: Optional secondary address
City: Valid city
Zip/Postal Code: Valid zip/postal code
Phone Number: Valid phone number
Fax Number: Optional
Test Steps:
1. Proceed to checkout
2. Enter billing details
3. Continue
Expected Results: Billing address is successfully saved and accepted.
Acceptance Criteria:
User is directed to the Shipping Address step.
No validation errors appear.
Billing address is stored for the current order

Objective: Use shipping address same as billing and proceed.
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Ship to same address'
2. Continue
Expected Results: Shipping address auto-filled and accepted.
Acceptance Criteria: User proceeds without additional input.

Objective: Verify validation when mandatory field missing
Test Steps:
1. Clear required field
2. Click Continue
Expected Results: Validation highlights missing field with message.
Acceptance Criteria: Cannot proceed until field is filling

Objective: Select shipping method.
Test Steps:
1. Select shipping method
2. Continue
Expected Results: Method saved, payment method step loads.
Acceptance Criteria: Selected value persists.

Objective: Select payment method
Test Data: Any available option (COD, Check/Money Order, Credit Card, Purchase Order)
Test Steps:
1. Select payment method
2. Continue
Expected Results: Payment info section appears.
Acceptance Criteria: Selected method persists to confirmation.

Objective: Place order and verify Thank You page shows valid Order Number (regex).
Test Steps:
1. Confirm order
2. On Thank You page capture Order Number
Expected Results: Order successful; order number displayed.
Acceptance Criteria: Order number matches regex pattern (e.g., #2129863).

Objective: Validate purchase flow in Chrome latest.
Test Steps: Run happy path in Chrome
Expected Results: Flow completes without critical UI issues.
Acceptance Criteria: Pages render correctly, all actions succeed.

Objective: Validate purchase flow in Firefox latest.
Test Steps: Run happy path in Firefox
Expected Results: Flow completes without critical UI issues.
Acceptance Criteria: Key elements functioning normally.

Objective: Validate purchase flow on mobile viewport.
Test Steps:
1. Set viewport to mobile size
2. Run happy path
Expected Results: No content clipping; menu accessible
Acceptance Criteria: All controls reachable no horizontal scroll on core pages.

Objective: Validate keyboard-only navigation.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate all forms and buttons using keyboard.
2. Complete checkout flow.
Expected Results: Visible focus indicator and operable elements.
Acceptance Criteria: No keyboard traps, logical focus order.

Objective: Verify labels for fields & alt text for images
Test Steps:
1. Inspect label for/id or aria-label
2. Check alt text for product images.
Expected Results: All fields have accessible labels, images have alt text
Acceptance Criteria: Meets basic WCAG labeling requirements.

Objective: Verify price, tax, shipping, and total calculations
Test Steps:
1.  Proceed to checkout summary
2. Record subtotal, tax, shipping, total
3. Verify formula: Total = Subtotal + Tax + Shipping – Discounts
Expected Results: Calculations are accurate
Acceptance Criteria: No mismatch > $0.01; totals match confirmation page
